code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useAllContext}from'../../App';import'../../Styles/ShowPopupBox.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowPopupUsernameForm=()=>{const StatesAndFunctions=useAllContext();const[userName,setUserName]=useState(localStorage.getItem('userName')||'');const handleUsernameFormSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();localStorage.setItem('userName',userName);StatesAndFunctions.changePopupMessageBox('',{});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"popup_container_wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"popup_container_header",children:"Your Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"popup_container_inner_wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"popup_inner_boxes",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username_input",children:"User Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"user_name",id:"username_input",placeholder:"Your name",defaultValue:userName,onChange:e=>setUserName(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",id:"popupform_submit_btn",className:"popup_btn",onClick:handleUsernameFormSubmit,children:"Save"})]})]});};export default ShowPopupUsernameForm;
